# GitHub Actions Status Badges

Add these badges to your README.md:

```markdown
![Tests](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/jact/openclinic-in-django/openclinic-ci.yml?branch=main&label=Tests)
![Lint](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/jact/openclinic-in-django/openclinic-ci.yml?branch=main&label=Lint)
![Security](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/jact/openclinic-in-django/openclinic-ci.yml?branch=main&label=Security)
![Docker](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/jact/openclinic-in-django/openclinic-ci.yml?branch=main&label=Docker)
![Coverage](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/jact/openclinic-in-django/openclinic-ci.yml?branch=main&label=Coverage)
```

## Badge Preview

| Badge | Status |
|-------|--------|
| Tests | ![Tests](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/jact/openclinic-in-django/openclinic-ci.yml?branch=main&label=Tests) |
| Lint | ![Lint](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/jact/openclinic-in-django/openclinic-in-django/openclinic-ci.yml?branch=main&label=Lint) |
| Security | ![Security](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/jact/openclinic-in-django/openclinic-ci.yml?branch=main&label=Security) |
| Docker | ![Docker](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/jact/openclinic-in-django/openclinic-ci.yml?branch=main&label=Docker) |
| Coverage | ![Coverage](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/jact/openclinic-in-django/openclinic-ci.yml?branch=main&label=Coverage) |

**Note**: Replace `jact/openclinic-in-django` with your actual GitHub repository path.

## Usage

Add to your README.md:

```markdown
## CI/CD Status

![Tests](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/YOUR_USERNAME/YOUR_REPO/openclinic-ci.yml?branch=main&label=Tests)
![Coverage](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/YOUR_USERNAME/YOUR_REPO/openclinic-ci.yml?branch=main&label=Coverage)
```
